name: Rabbids - Travel in Time 3D
synopsis: Join the rabbids as they travel back in time in a washing machine and make a mess of history! Tons of fun mini-games: over 60 maps with different types of gameplay in 4 different historical environments from Pre-history, Egypt, Rome & King Arthur. Realistic, 3D environments & characters: Colorful universe mixed with realistic textures & proportions & 3D characters with hilarious facial expressions. High level of customization: play and unlock close to 50 unique historical costumes, such as Indian, Cowboy, Egyptian and Musketeer.
